title: Bug 109718 - Put large content in text item, the tips show the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGES DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USERS TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTIONS 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTER UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put the mouse on the text item

Expected Result: The tips should show in the given format
Actual Result: The tips show in one line
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips in the text item should be displayed in the given format, even when the content is large.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Put a large content in a text item
3. Save the text item
4. Put the mouse on the text item
5. Observe the tips and note that they are displayed in one line instead of in the expected format
